title: SICNN: Sparsity-induced Input Convex Neural Network for Optimal Transport
details: P Chen, Y Xie, Q Zhang - OPT 2024: Optimization for Machine Learning
abstract: Optimal Transport (OT) theory seeks to find the map $ T: X\to Y $ that transports the source measure $ X $ to the target measure $ Y $, while minimizing the cost $ C (\mathbf {x}, T (\mathbf {x})) $ between a point $\mathbf {x} $ and its image $ T …
